p: The chemical composition of essential oils varies according to edaphic factors of soil and weather the chemotype of species and by human action. However, a refined phytochemical screening of the EOs by GC-MS provide the chemical profile of the species, as well as contribute to the prediction of biological activities. According to Almeida et al. [ 20], linalool and the Î´- decalactone has proven anticonvulsant activity, which may indicate a potential use of EOs of A. suaveolens.
